product.title: Qzbon CE 2 In 1 Rotating Brush Hot Air Styler Comb Curling Iron Roller Styler Brush Hair Dryer Blow Nozzles with 2 Speeds and 3 Heat Settings
product.title_excluding_brand: 2 In 1 Rotating Brush Hot Air Styler Comb Curling Iron Roller Styler Brush Hair Dryer Blow Nozzles with 2 Speeds and 3 Heat Settings
product.description:
Note:Only valid for countries with this voltage 220-240V, not 100-120V for this voltage.

Keep your hair away from the entry opening immediately to avoid getting involved.

The brush attachment is very hot in use, be careful when removing it.

Do not use this device with wet hands and store in a cool, dry place.

Feature:

Ergonomic streamlined body design is easy to hold and operate.

2 speed and 3 heat settings.

Two replaceable brushes and 1000W rated power, dry your hair quickly and style your hair easily at the same time.

With the rotation function, it can freely rotate 360° clockwise and counterclockwise, allowing you to dry your hair effortlessly.

Multifunctional hair dryer brush, suitable for drying, curling a variety of hair styles.

1.7m 360 degree swivel power cord, you can rotate it at any angle without worrying about winding.

Specification:

Material: ABS

Voltage: 220-240V

Frequency: 50/60Hz

Power: 1000W

Applicable hair: dry and wet

Overheat protection: yes

Handle: not foldable

Color: purple, red

Cord length: 1.7m

Power cord tail assembly mode: 360° rotatable

Size: 38.5*6cm (length * width)

Weight: 642g

Package Included:

1 x main machine

1x 38mm tube brush

1x 50mm tube brush

1 x user manual (multi-language)

protection_plans.title: Walmart Protection Plan - 2-Year Plan
protection_plans.description: Protect it today, enjoy it for years. Get award-winning Allstate service and support that goes above and beyond the manufacturer’s warranty. Health & beauty plans cover: Mechanical & electrical failures Breakdowns or failures during normal use Fast repairs & replacements with easy online claims available 24/7Includes 100% parts & labor with no hidden fees When you add your new health & beauty item to cart, be sure to add a Walmart Protection Plan, too. Simply add your plan at checkout. There’s no need to register your plan for it to be active. We’ll email you protection plan details after you check out.
